short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get prices and value of your favourite cryptos in real time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
safe.Crypto{price} is a tool for crypto traders and crypto enthusiasts where you can get prices of about 15000 cryptos in real time.

You can trace any amount of crypto you have or wish to have in your wallet
and see their prices and values in $.

You'll never have to enter any password, BE SAFE!

Version 2.0.0: 
- Redesigned for better user experience.
- We switched to CoinGecko, prices are now more accurate.
